page.title: 02DIY SHOP, HIGH STREET, WARE
page.content: The family have owned the{business}for eight years. There are nine full time staff and seven part time. Saturday is their busiest day. The owner likes selling DIY products and chatting to customers.{Electrical {tools}are the most profitable goods. Most is sold at holiday time. Business is good but there is competition with DIY hypermarkets. In the{ironmongery}section there are screws, hinges and locks for windows, cabinets and doors. There is a machine to cut keys. Customers prefer to buy individual items rather than packs of nails, hooks etc. The{paint mixing {machine}can mix 576 different colours. The{building}is 500 years old. The oak beams came from old sailing ships and are very hard from being in salt water. It has a low decorated ceiling. When lorries go past, the shop shakes!
